products.name: Textured-knit Tube Top
products.desciption: Short, textured-knit tube top. Sweetheart neckline at front with a metal wire and silicone trim inside upper edge to keep top in place.

products.name: Ribbed Tank Top
products.desciption: Fitted tank top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with narrow trim.

products.name: Linen T-Shirt
products.desciption: T-shirt in soft linen jersey with a low-cut, V-shaped neckline.

products.name: Fine-knit Corset-style Top
products.desciption: Short, fitted, corset-style top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with flat felled seams at front. Wide shoulder straps, square neckline, rounded, slightly longer hem at front, and a straight hem at back.

products.name: Ribbed Thong Bodysuit
products.desciption: Fitted, sleeveless thong bodysuit in ribbed jersey with a racer back. Concealed snap fasteners at gusset.
